examples: she entered with a great flourish

definitions.text: a display of ornamental speech or language
(music) a short lively tune played on brass instruments
examples: he entered to a flourish of trumpets
her arrival was greeted with a rousing fanfare
The deer population in this town is thriving

definitions.text: make steady progress; be at the high point in one's career or reach a high point in historical significance or importance
move or swing back and forth
